author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Cristiano Ronaldo ends 2023 as world's top goal scorer, says "will try to do it again" | Sports-Games
text:
Summary by Ground News Cristiano Ronaldo scored 54 goals for his country and his current club, Al Nassr. The five-time Ballon d'Or winner said that he will try to achieve it again next year. Harry Kane stood in second place with 52 goals for England and Bayern Munich's Kylian Mbappe. Share menu More

Following the landmark, the Portuguese superstar said that he will try to achieve it again next year. In 2023, the five-time Ballon d'Or winner scored 54 goals for his country and his current club, Al Nassr. English striker Harry Kane …
